dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1873 IH: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for House of Representatives, Office of the Minority Whip for fiscal year 2024.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs (for himself, Mr. Rosendale, Mr. Gaetz, Mr. Good of Virginia, Mr. Roy, and Mr. Crane) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for House of Representatives, Office of the Minority Whip for fiscal year 2024.

section.header: Limitation on availability of funds for House of Representatives, Office of the Minority Whip for fiscal year 2024
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of the law, amounts authorized to be appropriated or otherwise available for House of Representatives, Office of the Minority Whip for fiscal year 2024 may not exceed $1,700,079.
